definition: surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites

sentences.english: This is only done as an offering at Japanese funerals.
sentences.chinese: 這種行爲只會在日本葬禮作爲供奉先人的習俗進行。

sentences.english: After her funeral, I returned to her apartment with my family and friends.
sentences.chinese: 在她的葬禮後，我和家人朋友回到她的公寓。

sentences.english: The body was placed in bier before burial.
sentences.chinese: 在舉行葬禮以前屍體被放在棺材裏。

sentences.english: Mayhap a funeral among men is a wedding feast among the angels.
sentences.chinese: 也許人間的葬禮也同時是天使的婚禮。

sentences.english: At the end of the story, Seigo and Asako were attending the funeral of a friend.
sentences.chinese: 故事的結尾是省吾和志麻子一起去參加一個朋友葬禮。

sentences.english: Those unable to attend the funeral are asked to send flowers。
sentences.chinese: 不能現場出席葬禮的人士可以在網站獻花。

sentences.english: Bill Murray plays the funeral director anxious to keep the cantankerous customer satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 比爾默裏扮演的葬禮導演渴望保持過敏的顧客滿意。

sentences.english: He sang a mournful song at her funeral.
sentences.chinese: 在她的葬禮上他唱起了一道優傷的歌。

sentences.english: I never met them. They didn't come down for the funeral.
sentences.chinese: 我從沒見過他們，他們也沒來參加葬禮。

sentences.english: She keened for a long time at her mother's funeral.
sentences.chinese: 她在她母親的葬禮上慟哭了好一陣。

sentences.english: Laughing and joking are improper at a funeral.
sentences.chinese: 葬禮時大笑和開玩笑是不合適的。

sentences.english: They attended the funeral with heavy hearts.
sentences.chinese: 他們心情沉重地參加了這場葬禮。

sentences.english: Maybe the idiot can give us all a mass Gungan funeral.
sentences.chinese: 也許那個白癡能給我們舉行一次集體剛根式葬禮。

sentences.english: I found a person who watched with him, and was present at his burial.
sentences.chinese: 我找到一個一直陪着他的人，葬禮的時候也在場。

sentences.english: Atzel was so exhausted with happiness that he slept right through it.
sentences.chinese: 阿採爾快樂得精疲力盡，整個葬禮過程中都沉睡着。

sentences.english: After that the generals began to disperse with the solemnity and circumspect taciturnity with which people separate after a funeral.
sentences.chinese: 將軍們隨即莊嚴肅穆地退場，像參加完了葬禮一樣。
